alert.note: Alert for McMinn; Monroe (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 14 at 9:53PM CDT until August 14 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM EDT FOR EAST CENTRAL MCMINN AND SOUTHWESTERN MONROE COUNTIES... At 1053 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Etowah, or 10 miles southwest of Madisonville, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Athens, Madisonville, Etowah, Englewood, Tellico Plains, Niota, and Mount Vernon. This includes Interstate 75 in Tennessee between mile markers 50 and 52. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
